content: 2000 TV series or program ***As You Like It*** (随心所遇) is a [Singaporean](/wiki/Singapore) Chinese television series about four singles around the age of twenty, two guys and two girls, and the time they spend together discussing life, love, sex and work. It stars [Tay Ping Hui](/wiki/Tay_Ping_Hui), [Ix Shen](/wiki/Ix_Shen), Lynn Poh, [Joey Swee](/wiki/Joey_Swee) and [Bernard Tan](/wiki/Bernard_Tan_(actor)). - AZN Television page - *As You Like It* (Chinese) on Mediacorp website This Singaporean television-related article is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it. - v - t - e
title: As You Like It (TV series)
